about_the_game:
Severed Lands is an MMORPG about a divided continent, where two contrasting societies shape the destiny of a turbulent world. Siparia, a vast nation where cooperation, competition, and aspiration intertwine amidst a carefully balanced order. Within its borders, a multitude of paths unfold—some choose to contribute and survive, finding solace in the stability of communal existence, while others harbor relentless ambitions, striving to ascend the social hierarchy and claim the pinnacle of power. Meanwhile, beyond the structured confines of Siparia lies The Pitts, a lawless expanse where untamed individualism thrives. Here, exiles and seekers of freedom embrace a life of self-determination, daring to challenge the established order.Forge your own path, whether it leads to the upper echelons of society or unveils the untamed spirit within, as you leave an indelible mark upon a realm where ambition, survival, and cooperation entwine in an epic tapestry of discovery and self-realization.



KEY FEATURES

Player-Driven Economy

The majority of in-game items are handcrafted by players who gather and manufacture resources. You can venture into the realm of prosperous entrepreneurship by engaging in buying, selling, or trading activities with other players, which can lead to substantial wealth and recognition within the community. Within the expansive world of the game, you'll encounter a diverse array of both indispensable and extravagant items that players eagerly seek to possess.

Establish A Home

Stake your claim on inhabitable land and establish a settlement either independently or in collaboration with your companions. Construct essential structures to support your progress and advancement. Cultivate fertile fields, nurturing delicious crops that can be sold or consumed. Erect a barn and raise livestock for sustenance or as loyal mounts. The vast world offers an abundance of locations to select from, with certain areas holding greater potential to meet your specific requirements.

Conquer The World

While certain individuals possess natural talent for crafting fine swords or nurturing bountiful crops, there are those who carve out their existence by sowing chaos and devastation as they traverse between settlements. Lives can be abruptly taken, possessions mercilessly seized, and thriving settlements reduced to ruins through brutal sieges. In Severed Lands, the concept of safety eludes both individuals and objects, as no guarantees exist in this unforgiving realm.

Learn skills.

Upon first entering the game world, you will know very little, but, over time, through studying your surrounding environment and its resources you will develop the knowledge to craft and build many items and structures essential for survival. Set yourself apart from your peers and specialize in a profession of your choice, or perhaps becoming a jack of all trades is more to your liking. Either way, many benefits can be derived from both paths if you are up for the challenge

Action Combat

Engage in satisfying player vs player battles that minimizes advantages gained from twitch responses and rewards knowledge, decision-making, pattern recognition, predictions and skill. In Severed Lands, all attacks need to be carefully aimed and timed. Utilize these factors to conquer enemies physically stronger than yourself.

short_description: Severed Lands is an open-world sandbox MMORPG featuring crafting, base-building, a player-driven economy, full-loot, and sieges. Flourish as warriors, merchants or seasoned professionals. Severed Lands provides the freedom to pursue your desired goals and discover the optimal path to attain them.
